text: Va [jod kun az] hangome ki kuhro [az coj ʙarkandem va] hamcun sojaʙone ʙar farozason ʙarafrostem va pindostand, ki ʙar onon furud meojad [va dar in holat az onon ahd giriftem va guftem] «On ciro, ki ʙa sumo dodaem, ʙo neru [va ciddijat] ʙigired va onciro, ki dar on ast, ʙa jod dosta ʙosed [va ʙa on amal namoed], ʙosad, ki parvo kuned
